devdoc.title: The contract for calculating and executing keeper reward payments

PoolUpkeepError(address,string).notice: Creates a notification of a failed pool update

FIXED_GAS_OVERHEAD().notice: Captures fixed gas overhead for performing upkeep that's unreachable by `gasleft()` due to our approach to error handling in that code

keeperGas(uint256,uint256,uint256).notice: Compensation a keeper will receive for their gas expenditure

keeperReward(address,uint256,uint256,uin.notice: Payment keeper receives for performing upkeep on a given pool

keeperTip(uint256,uint256).notice: Tip a keeper will receive for successfully updating the specified pool
